mapper.sql: id, id_card, name, address, in_time, temperature, whe_leave, health_code, registe_people, regist_time
mapper.update: update get_in_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_time = #{inTime}, whe_leave = #{wheLeave}, health_code = #{healthCode} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select temperature,in_time from get_in_info where id_card = #{idCard} ORDER BY in_time ASC LIMIT 7
